docs.snippet: England overcame some stubborn resistance from a well-organised defensive Peru side before sealing a comfortable 3-0 win in their last home World Cup warm-up match at Wembley on Friday.
docs.lead_paragraph: England overcame some stubborn resistance from a well-organised defensive Peru side before sealing a comfortable 3-0 win in their last home World Cup warm-up match at Wembley on Friday.

headline.main: England Enjoy Win Over Peru in Last Home Warm-Up
headline.print_headline: England Enjoy Win Over Peru in Last Home Warm-Up

docs.snippet: England manager Roy Hodgson praised Daniel Sturridge for the striker's sensational goal that set England on their way to a comfortable 3-0 win over Peru in a World Cup warm-up on Friday.
docs.lead_paragraph: England manager Roy Hodgson praised Daniel Sturridge for the striker's sensational goal that set England on their way to a comfortable 3-0 win over Peru in a World Cup warm-up on Friday.

headline.main: Sturridge Goal Unlocked Game, Says England Boss Hodgson

docs.snippet: Uruguay missed the clinical finishing of convalescent Luis Suarez when they beat Northern Ireland 1-0 in a World Cup warm-up on Friday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay missed the clinical finishing of convalescent Luis Suarez when they beat Northern Ireland 1-0 in a World Cup warm-up on Friday.

docs.snippet: Britain’s ambassador to Cuba has appealed to soccer fans in that country to support England in the World Cup.

headline.main: Countdown to 2014 World Cup in Brazil: Day 13

docs.snippet: With a squad packed full of talent from Europe's top clubs, Argentina is certainly one of the title contenders at this year's World Cup.

docs.snippet: Last time, Ghana came awfully close to being the first African team to reach the World Cup semifinals, its progress halted by a handball on the goal-line from Uruguay striker Luis Suarez and Asamoah Gyan's miss from the resulting penalty late in...
docs.lead_paragraph: Last time, Ghana came awfully close to being the first African team to reach the World Cup semifinals, its progress halted by a handball on the goal-line from Uruguay striker Luis Suarez and Asamoah Gyan's miss from the resulting penalty late in extra time.

headline.main: Ghana Seeks to Make World Cup History for Africa
headline.print_headline: Ghana Seeks to Make World Cup History for Africa

docs.snippet: Michael Essien and Kevin-Prince Boateng are both returning after extended breaks from international football to play for Ghana at the World Cup, and Andre Ayew is also likely to be one of the country's pivotal players in Brazil.
docs.lead_paragraph: Michael Essien and Kevin-Prince Boateng are both returning after extended breaks from international football to play for Ghana at the World Cup, and Andre Ayew is also likely to be one of the country's pivotal players in Brazil.

headline.main: 5 Ghana Players to Watch at the World Cup
headline.print_headline: 5 Ghana Players to Watch at the World Cup

docs.snippet: South America's biggest city will be the first to see some action at the World Cup when Brazil plays Croatia at the stadium where a crane collapse killed two workers last year.
docs.lead_paragraph: South America's biggest city will be the first to see some action at the World Cup when Brazil plays Croatia at the stadium where a crane collapse killed two workers last year.

docs.snippet: Fortaleza is Brazil's fifth-largest city, and one of the most popular tourist destinations in the northeast with or without the World Cup.

docs.snippet: Belo Horizonte was one of the first Brazilian cities to be ready for the World Cup, avoiding the delays that marked the preparations of nearly all other host cities.
